name: Hotel Mayhem
description: This is a game, where you try to clear the whole floor, from ghosts, zombies, Vampires and more. The aim of the game is to get the highest score possible. Every review is very helpful so make sure to leave one. Thank you to everyone who has played the game. Also there's a glitch where you can't move the player, in that case just reload the site. And the spikes don't work properly, they can one shot you easily sometimes so be careful.
